tourBios.otherInfo: Has played on the Web.com Tour, Tour de Las Americas, New England, Golden Bear, and Cleveland tours, Two-time finalist of the Jamaican Sportsman of the Year (1996 and 1999), Member of the Rollins College (1996 to 1997) and University of South Carolina (1997 to 2001) Golf Teams, Winner of the 1999 NCAA Division 1 Red River Classic in Dallas where he set a course record of 197 to finish the event at 19-under par

dyn.dynBios: Holds the all-time University of South Carolina record for lowest score
dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Canada was T6th in 2010 at the Riviera Nayarit Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T12th in Consecutive Cuts on the PGA TOUR Canada.
